animation.condition: ![System.GetBool(lookandfeel.enablerssfeeds) + String.IsEqual(Skin.String(HorizontalRSSPosition),high)] + [System.GetBool(lookandfeel.enablerssfeeds) + !String.IsEqual(Skin.String(HorizontalRSSPosition),high) + Skin.HasSetting(SystemBarOnTop) + Skin.HasSetting(centermainmenu)] | [!System.GetBool(lookandfeel.enablerssfeeds) + Skin.HasSetting(SystemBarOnTop) + Skin.HasSetting(centermainmenu)] | ![System.GetBool(lookandfeel.enablerssfeeds) + String.IsEqual(Skin.String(HorizontalRSSPosition),high)] + [System.GetBool(lookandfeel.enablerssfeeds) + !String.IsEqual(Skin.String(HorizontalRSSPosition),high) + Skin.HasSetting(SystemBarOnTop) + !Skin.HasSetting(centermainmenu)] | [!System.GetBool(lookandfeel.enablerssfeeds) + Skin.HasSetting(SystemBarOnTop) + !Skin.HasSetting(centermainmenu)]
